# locationSearchType

**Instance Property**

An indicator of how to apply location values to your search.

## Declaration

```swift
var locationSearchType: INLocationSearchType { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the value in this property to determine how to apply the value in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent/location] property to your search results. When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INLocationSearchType/unknown], do not consider location as part of your search criteria.

## Searching for Tasks by Location

- **location**: The value to use when searching for location-triggered reminders.
- **INLocationSearchType**: Constants indicating the type of location-based search to perform.
